title: Best of The Herd
itunes:title: Best of The Herd
description:
Colin dissects the comments from Steph Curry who politely decline to team up with LeBron James and what this says about James at this point in his historically great career. He believes the latest Bruce Arians remarks downplaying Tom Brady's contributions to winning the Super Bowl is validating the rift Colin said was the reason Arians was forced out of his head coaching position. He also points out the number 1 problem facing the NBA right now. Plus, Greg Cosell from NFL Films joins the show to tell Colin why Pitt QB Kenny Pickett is the real deal and should be considered a legitimate first round prospect in the draft.
